Detailed Description

Test runner used to determine which test to run.

User may extends this class to provide a custom test runner to TestRegistry.

virtual void easyunit::TestRunner::run (  TestCase *  testCase,
int  size

Method used to run testcases by TestRegistry.

User should override this method in order to provide custom behavior.

Parameters:
